revised_title: Description and Analysis of Gigantic Land-Lizard (Megalania prisca) Remains from Australia
tldr: The author examines the remains of the gigantic land-lizard Megalania prisca from Australia, providing a detailed description of the skeletal structure and comparing it to other lizard species. The article discusses the extinction of this species and its contemporaneous large marsupial mammals, as well as the geological context of the fossil discoveries.
